name: 2D Baseball Duel
description:
Pitcher and Batter, on the Field!

The Pitcher has a mean Breaking Ball!

The Batter must battle the count to survive!

Enjoy the drama of Baseball in two dimensions!


FEATURES:
  • Defeat the Local Teams to unlock new pitches!
  • 25+ unique Unlockable Pitches!
  • Fool the Batter with the Breaking Ball!
  • Get competitive with Local Multiplayer!
  • Sock some Dingers in Home Run Derby!
  • Original SoundTrack!
  • Secrets and Surprises!
